```xml:app/src/main/res/layout/activity_kid_dashboard.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 android:background="@drawable/gradient_background"
 android:orientation="vertical">

 <!-- Header Section -->
 <LinearLayout
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:background="@color/primary_green"
 android:padding="20dp"
 android:orientation="vertical"
 android:gravity="center">

 <!-- Greeting and Name -->
 <TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_greeting"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="Good Morning!"
 android:textColor="@android:color/white"
 android:textSize="18sp"
 android:textStyle="bold" />

 <TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_child_name"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginTop="4dp"
 android:text="Alex"
 android:textColor="@android:color/white"
 android:textSize="24sp"
 android:textStyle="bold" />

 <!-- Star Balance Display -->
 <LinearLayout
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
 android:background="@drawable/star_balance_background"
 android:padding="12dp"
 android:orientation="horizontal"
 android:gravity="center">

 <ImageView
 android:id="@+id/iv_star_icon"
 android:layout_width="32dp"
 android:layout_height="32dp"
 android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
 android:src="@drawable/ic_star"
 app:tint="@color/star_yellow" />

 <TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_star_balance"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="25"
 android:textColor="@color/star_yellow"
 android:textSize="28sp"
 android:textStyle="bold" />

 <TextView
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginStart="4dp"
 android:text="stars"
 android:textColor="@android:color/white"
 android:textSize="16sp" />

 </LinearLayout>

 <!-- Settings Button (TTS Toggle) -->
 <ImageButton
 android:id="@+id/btn_settings"
 android:layout_width="48dp"
 android:layout_height="48dp"
 android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
 android:background="@drawable/circle_background"
 android:backgroundTint="@android:color/white"
 android:src="@drawable/ic_volume_up"
 android:padding="12dp"
 app:tint="@color/primary_green"
 android:contentDescription="Toggle voice" />

 </LinearLayout>

 <!-- Main Content -->
 <FrameLayout
 android:id="@+id/fragment_container_kid"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="0dp"
 android:layout_weight="1" />

 <!-- Bottom Navigation -->
 <com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView
 android:id="@+id/bottom_navigation_kid"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="80dp"
 android:background="@android:color/white"
 android:elevation="8dp"
 app:menu="@menu/kid_bottom_navigation"
 app:itemIconTint="@drawable/bottom_nav_color_selector"
 app:itemTextColor="@drawable/bottom_nav_color_selector"
 app:labelVisibilityMode="labeled"
 app:itemIconSize="32dp"
 app:itemTextAppearanceActive="@style/BottomNavigationTextActive"
 app:itemTextAppearanceInactive="@style/BottomNavigationTextInactive" />

</LinearLayout>
```
